item.title: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10/AZ-51
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10/AZ-51 in Phoenix. Use right lane for AZ-51; left lane for I-10 East.

item.title: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10 and AZ-51
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop West at I-10 and AZ-51 in Phoenix. Use right lane for AZ-51 North; left lane for I-10 East/Tucson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West - Exits 1B and 1A
item.description: AZ-202 Loop West approaching Exit 1B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 1A - 1-10 East/Tucson/AZ-51 North.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West - Exit 5
item.description: AZ-202 Loop West at Exit 5 - To AZ-143 South/Sky Harbor Airport. Continue west on AZ-202 Loop for I-10.

item.title: Dobson Road North At AZ-202 Loop
item.description: Dobson Road North At AZ-202 Loop in Mesa.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West - Exits 1B and 1A
item.description: AZ-202 Loop west at Exit 1B - 24th St. Approaching Exit 1A - I-10 East/Tucson/AZ-51 North. Continue ahead for I-10 west for Los Angeles. The left most lane is for I-10 west HOV traffic.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West Approaching Exits 6 and 5
item.description: AZ-202 Loop west approaching Exit 6 - Center Parkway/Priest Drive and Exit 7 - To AZ-143 South/Sky Harbor Airport. AZ-202 Loop continues west towards I-10. The left most lane is a HOV lane.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East at AZ-87
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East, Exit 13 offramp, at AZ-87. Use AZ-87 north for Fountain Hills and Payson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exit 13
item.description: AZ-202 Loop east at Exit 13 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Payson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East Approaching Exit 13
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East approaching Exit 13 - AZ-87/Country Club Drive/Payson.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exits 8 and 9
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East at Exit 8 - McClintock Road. Approaching Exit 9 - AZ-101 Loop. The left lane is designated for HOV traffic.

item.title: Scottsdale Road South at AZ-202 Loop
item.description: Scottsdale Road south at AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East - Exit 3
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East at Exit 3 - AZ-143 South/Washington St./McDowell Road.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop East Approaching Exits 2 and 3
item.description: AZ-202 Loop East approaching Exit 2 - 40th St./44th St. Approaching Exit 3 - AZ-143 South/McDowell Road/Washington St.

item.title: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East
item.description: N. 24th St. at AZ-202 Loop East onramp.

item.title: N. 24th St. Approaching AZ-202 Loop and I-10
item.description: N. 24th St. approaching AZ-202 Loop and I-10.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 147A and B
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 147B - AZ-51 North. Approaching Exit 147A - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 148 and 147AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 148 - Jefferson St./Washington St. Approaching Exits 148A-B - AZ-51 North/AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 West - Exits 149 and Exit 147AB
item.description: I-10 west at Exit 149 - Buckeye Road/Sky Harbor Airport/Rental Car Return. Approaching Exit 147B - AZ-51 North and Exit 147A - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: US-60 West - Exit 190A
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 190A - AZ-202 Loop. This is the eastern extent of the AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: US-60 West - Exits 191 and 190A
item.description: US-60 west at Exit 191 - Ellsworth Road. Approaching Exit 190A - AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: AZ-143 North - Exit 3
item.description: AZ-143 north at Exit 3 - AZ-202 Loop/Mesa. All of the loop roads in the Phoenix area have different color shields. AZ-202 Loop has a brown shield.

item.title: AZ-143 North - Exit 2 and Exit 3AB
item.description: AZ-143 north at Exit 2 - University Drive. Approaching Exit 3A - AZ-202 Loop East and Exit 3B - Sky Harbor Airport. The AZ-202 Loop shield appears to be faded. Normally AZ-202 Loop is a brown color.

item.title: AZ-202 West - Exit 55AB
item.description: AZ-202 West Exit 55 Offramp at Exit 55B - I-10 East/Tucson and Exit 55A - I-10 West/Phoenix.

item.title: End AZ-202 West at I-10
item.description: End AZ-202 Loop west at I-10 - Exit 55AB - Tucson/Phoenix. Continue straight for Pecos Road.

item.title: AZ-202 Loop West Approaching Exit 53 and Exit 55AB
item.description: AZ-202 Loop west approaching Exit 53 - Kyrene Road. Approaching 55AB - I-10/Phoenix-Tucson.

item.title: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop
item.description: End AZ-101 Loop at AZ-202 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61BC
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East. This is the southern end of AZ-101 Loop.

item.title: AZ-101 Loop South - Exit 61 AB
item.description: AZ-101 Loop south at Exit 61A - Price Road. Approaching Exit 61B - AZ-202 Loop West and Exit 61C - AZ-202 Loop East.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 161
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 161 - AZ-202 Loop East/Pecos Road. Overhead for I-10 east to Tucson.

item.title: I-10 East - Exit 160 and Exit 161
item.description: I-10 east at Exit 160 - Wild Horse Pass Blvd./Sundust Road. Overhead for I-10 East/Tucson.
